html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13302024-12-16TC
ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made under the Motor Vehicle Safety Act (Recall Information)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY ACT (RECALL INFORMATION) in order to (1) require companies that issue a safety recall for vehicles to also publish safety recall related information on their website; (2) standardize the availability and the type of information; (3) provide a timeline by which such information must be made available; and (4) facilitate Canadians' ability to find recall information by including an online search tool that would provide safety recall information that is specific to one vehicle, using the unique 17-character vehicle identification number.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0274 Publication Date: 2025-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY ACT (RECALL INFORMATION) in order to (1) require companies that issue a safety recall for vehicles to also publish safety recall related information on their website; (2) standardize the availability and the type of information; (3) provide a timeline by which such information must be made available; and (4) facilitate Canadians' ability to find recall information by including an online search tool that would provide safety recall information that is specific to one vehicle, using the unique 17-character vehicle identification number.
